title: Feast On You
description: The debut book in a promising new erotic werewolf romance series, The Turning!My name is Connor, and I'm a werewolf. It has only been a month since my Turning, and there is a hunger deep within me that can only satiated by the taste of a woman. Luckily, I found her.Mindy is a young promising photojournalist at the Chicago Sun Times, spending her days capturing the wildlife and the scenery at Lake Superior. Little did she know that she'd learn more than she expected about the wilds of Minnesota. The two fall quickly and deeply in love, and when Connor brings Mindy back to his cave she discovers that he is more than meets the eye...Warning: this short story contains graphic erotic scenes and intimate sex. It contains oral sex, penetrative sex, light BDSM, werewolf sex. This story is approximately 6,300 words
author: Kinsey Jamison
